reqs:
Pre-reqs: Three of THTR 371, THTR 372, THTR 373, THTR 374, THTR 391.
This course is restricted to students registered in UBC's BFA Acting Program.
Assigned projects in performance
courseName: Advanced Rehearsal and Performance - AD REHEARS&PERF
description: Open only to B.F.A. Acting students.
